name: Fish Curry
description: How to make fish curry in indian style ?
instructions: Get some fish. Make some curry & combine it together.

name: Milk Shake
description: How to make milk shake in home ?
instructions: Get some mango pulp. Blend it with milk in blender.

name: Sandwich
description: How to make a sandwich in home ?
instructions: Slice some breads & bake a patty. Then sandwich it & its done.

name: Chowmein
description: How to make chowmein in home ?
instructions: Boil water mix chomein. Cut some veggies & mix it. Then its done.

name: Noodles
instructions: Boil water mix noodles. Mix some veggies & its done.

name: Smoothie
instructions: Cut some fruits & add some milk in blender with fruits. Then its done.

name: Pizza
description: How to make pizza in home ?
instructions: Create the flour base then add some topping in it. Then put it oven & its done.

name: Fried Chicken
description: How to make fried chicken in home ?
instructions: Get some fresh chicken from store. then marinate it with mexican sauce & fry it.

name: Vanilla Shake
description: How to make vanilla shake in home ?
instructions: Get some vanilla icecream then add some milk in it & mix it in blender.

name: Mix Veg
instructions: Cut some veggies & mix it in frying pan with some mexican masala.
